name: listItemTrim
description: Trims every item in the list and returns a new list.

params.name: list
params.description: The list with the items, you want to trim.

params.name: delimiters
params.description: The delimiters which the list is using.

params.name: includeEmptyFields
params.description: By default empty items will be removed from the list. If it is true, empty items will be stay in the list.

examples.title: Simple Example
examples.description: Trims each item in the list.

examples.title: Using as member function
examples.description: Trims each item in the list.

examples.title: Keep empty items in the list
examples.description: Trims each item in the list and keep empty items.
examples.code:
exampleList = "hello, world ,this, is a,  ,,example";
writeOutput(listItemTrim(examplelist, ",", true));
